title: Update gazebo to match current API for sensors, hands, and robot

content.raw:
To facilitate development, and increase the utility of Gazebo/drcsim  the interfaces should match the APIs being used by the actual robot.

From training at BDI, there are differences between the API developed for VRC.  This was understandable, but going forward having a consistent API is important to minimize the code changes and facilitate rapid testing.
